name: Aggressive Instinct
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor_text:
"Mowu was wary that day, as though he sensed the danger ahead."
—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

name: Aquitect's Will
oracle_text: Put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it. If you control a Merfolk, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"You may want to hold your breath."
—Kellyg, merrow aquitect

name: Armored Whirl Turtle
flavor_text: Not all enormous beasts are quick to anger.

name: Ash Barrens
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Borderland Explorer
oracle_text: When Borderland Explorer enters the battlefield, each player may discard a card. Each player who discarded a card this way may search their library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into their hand, then shuffle.

name: Brainwash
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text: "They're not your friends; they despise you. I'm the only one you can count on. Trust me."

name: Breath of Fire
oracle_text: Breath of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: Fire leads to more fire.

name: Burnt Offering
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Add X mana in any combination of {B} and/or {R}, where X is the sacrificed creature's mana value.

name: Cemetery Gate
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Protection from black

name: Cleansing Screech
oracle_text: Cleansing Screech deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "Crackle" and "pop" are the most wondrous sounds.

name: Cloak of Mists
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
flavor_text: Mystery lies beneath the haunting mists. Never stay where obscurity deepens.

name: Colorful Feiyi Sparrow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: These nimble sparrows, not often seen, delight in tricking the pangolins that wander the forest.

name: Confidence from Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text:
"Prepare for battle!"
—Jiang Yanggu

name: Custodi Squire
oracle_text:
Flying
Will of the council — When Custodi Squire enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for an artifact, creature, or enchantment card in your graveyard. Return each card with the most votes or tied for most votes to your hand.

name: Drafna's Restoration
oracle_text: Put any number of target artifact cards from target player's graveyard on top of their library in any order.

name: Dragon's Presence
oracle_text: Dragon's Presence deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"The Ancestor Dragon appeared atop the clouds, amid shattering mountains and sundering earth."
—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

name: Drown in Shapelessness
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "From the swallows, I learned how to ride the winds to anywhere, and from my tears, I mastered how to harness the water."

name: Earth-Origin Yak
oracle_text: When Earth-Origin Yak enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Deep in the Northern Mountains, the yaks linger silently, channeling the powers of the earth.

name: Earthshaking Si
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text:
"For reasons unknown to me, herds in the Arrow Bamboo Forest have become more and more agitated."
—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

name: Energy Tap
oracle_text: Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, add an amount of {C} equal to that creature's mana value.

name: Entourage of Trest
oracle_text:
When Entourage of Trest enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Entourage of Trest can block an additional creature each combat as long as you're the monarch.
flavor_text:
"The dim resort to violence, for which the nimble prepare."
—Leovold, emissary of Trest

name: Feiyi Snake
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Two bodies, twice the malice.

name: Ferocious Zheng
flavor_text: Known for their glowing horn and stone-rattling roar, zheng are the fiercest predators in the forest. Few survived before Jiang Yanggu came.

name: Flood
oracle_text: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.

name: Forge of Heroes
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Choose target commander that entered the battlefield this turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature and a loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker.
flavor_text: History is not delicately woven. It is hammered with fire.

name: Garrulous Sycophant
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Marchesa's poison is delivered by more than daggers."
—Adriana, Captain of the Guard

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: The welcoming appearance of the Arrow Bamboo Forest masks its deathly hostility.

name: Hardened-Scale Armor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
flavor_text: A pangolin's scales are resistant to all sorts of damage and weaponry. Desire for them threatens to drive the pangolin to extinction.

name: Heavenly Qilin
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Heavenly Qilin attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: It strides through the universe as though stepping on the stars, crossing freely between the celestial and earthly worlds.

name: Leopard-Spotted Jiao
flavor_text: This strange beast has the hide of a leopard, the howl of a dog, and the horns of an ox.

name: Lonely Sandbar
oracle_text:
Lonely Sandbar enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Meandering River
oracle_text:
Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text: Clouds and mists cover the lake as though it were a dreamland. When the wind rises, the mists disperse, opening great vistas of rippling reeds.

name: Metamorphosis
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Add X mana of any one color, where X is 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

name: Nine-Tail White Fox
oracle_text: Whenever Nine-Tail White Fox deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: It has waited a millennium just for you, and for a millennium will it watch over your descendants.

name: Palace Sentinels
oracle_text: When Palace Sentinels enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor_text:
"One who ruled willing subjects would need no such protection."
—Adriana, Captain of the Guard

name: Path of Ancestry
oracle_text:
Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Pit Scorpion
oracle_text: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
flavor_text: Sometimes the smallest nuisance can be the greatest pain.

name: Purple-Crystal Crab
oracle_text: When Purple-Crystal Crab dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: A precious shell without, a delicious taste within.

name: Qilin's Blessing
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Interesting . . . This mortal being seems to have been blessed with Qilin's essence."
—Mu Yanling's journal

name: Reckless Pangolin
oracle_text: Whenever Reckless Pangolin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"A pangolin's power grows with its speed. Strike when you have the chance!"
—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

name: Salvage
oracle_text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text:
"What was taken shall be restored."
—Arathel, elvish queen

name: Sinuous Vermin
oracle_text:
{3}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Sinuous Vermin is monstrous, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Skittering Crustacean
oracle_text:
{6}{U}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Skittering Crustacean is monstrous, it has hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Thorn of the Black Rose
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Thorn of the Black Rose enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor_text: If bribery and intimidation fail, Marchesa turns to her favorite form of bureaucracy.

name: Throne Warden
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, put a +1/+1 counter on Throne Warden.
flavor_text: "Rulers come and go, but my allegiance belongs to the throne."

name: Timber Gorge
oracle_text:
Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
flavor_text: Near the Western Seas lies Mount Zhaoyao—a forest of stones that reaches the clouds, a bountiful land of wondrous treasures and strange animals.

name: Vivid Flying Fish
oracle_text: Vivid Flying Fish has flying as long as it's attacking. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: The rainbow seen above the Great Lake of Cloud Dream just after the rain is nothing but the vivid-colored flying fishes' ritual dance.

name: Welkin Tern
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: It stops flying only as its life comes to an end.
